text:
Stupid corporate cyber security training that requires me to watch videos, but doesn't let me increase play back speed...

> What is... social engineering? ....... It might .. sound ... like .. a university course ..... but it's .. actually... 
:ahhhhhhh:

text:
if its html5 video, theres a chrome/firefox extension   
<https://github.com/igrigorik/videospeed|https://github.com/igrigorik/videospeed> that should allow you to watch it fast.

elements.text: if its html5 video, theres a chrome/firefox extension
that should allow you to watch it fast.

text:
I've discovered that I can just play it in a muted tab, then come back every 5 minutes to answer the quiz questions.

> When you receive an email with a suspicious link, you should
> 
> a. Report the email and delete it
> b. Forward it to your friends, family, and colleagues to ask them if it's suspicious
> c. Burn your computer and desk in a glorious bonfire while you perform a ritual sacrifice of a goat or sheep

What is... social engineering? ....... It might .. sound ... like .. a university course ..... but it's .. actually...
I've discovered that I can just play it in a muted tab, then come back every 5 minutes to answer the quiz questions.

When you receive an email with a suspicious link, you should

a. Report the email and delete it
b. Forward it to your friends, family, and colleagues to ask them if it's suspicious
c. Burn your computer and desk in a glorious bonfire while you perform a ritual sacrifice of a goat or sheep

text: In high school, we had to do a financial literacy interactive thing like that. I got through most of Beethoven's symphonies, and had a lovely couple of days in a really boring class

elements.text: In high school, we had to do a financial literacy interactive thing like that. I got through most of Beethoven's symphonies, and had a lovely couple of days in a really boring class

text: It’s always nice when you can pre-test out of such things

elements.text: It’s always nice when you can pre-test out of such things

text: I’ve seen tougher questions that make you question your intelligence afterwards :dizzy_face:
